Literature.Title: Immune mediators of sea-cucumber Holothuria tubulosa (Echinodermata) as source of novel antimicrobial and anti-staphylococcal biofilm agents.
Literature.Author: Schillaci D, Cusimano MG, Cunsolo V, Saletti R, Russo D, Vazzana M, Vitale M, Arizza V

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rabbit erythrocytes:1% Hemolysis=1500-3200 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=6200 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:12.5% Hemolysis=50000 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>12500µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=12500µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=12500µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=12500µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>12500µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=12500µg/ml)
